labels.name: Positive
labels.description: The text expresses a clearly positive, happy, or favorable sentiment.

labels.name: Negative
labels.description: The text expresses a clearly negative, unhappy, or unfavorable sentiment.

labels.name: Neutral
labels.description: The text is objective, factual, or does not express a strong emotion.

labels.name: Inquisitive
labels.description: The text is primarily asking a question or expressing curiosity.

labels.name: Urgent
labels.description: The text conveys a sense of urgency, requiring immediate attention or action.
